original_text: And to them it was given that they should not kill them, but that they should be tormented five months: and their torment was as the torment of a scorpion, when he striketh a man.
korean_text: 그러나 그들을 죽이지는 못하게 하시고 다섯 달 동안 괴롭게만 하게 하시는데 그 괴롭게 함은 전갈이 사람을 쏠 때에 괴롭게 함과 같더라

sentences.original_text: And to them it was given
that they should not kill them
but that they should be tormented five months
and their torment was as the torment of a scorpion
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 고통은 전갈의 고통과 같았으니
